paragraphs: Front-end web engineer | artist | originally from Greenville, SC

I am a web programmer finding the best place for myself in the developersâ€™ work force. Successful problem solving drives my work and makes the challenge of coding enjoyable and exciting. I am inspired and ready to work hard with my colleagues to create user friendly and fun web experiences.
